Name: Brave Heroes
About the game: About Game Brave Heroes is a game where you can play with different heroes with different move abilities and try to complete 4 seasons total of 20 minutes, with the powerful abilities and the help of the environment and nature. Environment Animals and other materials create areas that give you temporary buffs Abilities Unique abilities to use against thousands of creatures Abilities Each hero has a different ability. Necromancer summons skeletons Yuri controls enemies
